title: 客户端安装mod崩溃
author: ycl0605
txt_content:
1.7.0客户端安装mod崩溃 以下错误报告

[03:29:55] [main/INFO]: Setting user: RUIR
[03:29:57] [Client thread/INFO]: LWJGL Version: 2.9.1
[03:30:08] [Client thread/INFO]: Reloading ResourceManager: Default, FMLFileResourcePack:Forge Mod Loader, FMLFileResourcePack:Minecraft Forge, FMLFileResourcePack:Not Enough Items, FMLFileResourcePack:Advanced Solar Panels, FMLFileResourcePack:Applied Energistics 2, FMLFileResourcePack:ArmorStatusHUD, FMLFileResourcePack:BC Builders, FMLFileResourcePack:BC Transport, FMLFileResourcePack:BC Energy, FMLFileResourcePack:BC Silicon, FMLFileResourcePack:BC Robotics, FMLFileResourcePack:BuildCraft, FMLFileResourcePack:BC Factory, FMLFileResourcePack:CraftGuide, FMLFileResourcePack:Damage Indicators, FMLFileResourcePack:Dynamic Lights, FMLFileResourcePack:Dynamic Lights Burning Entity Module, FMLFileResourcePack:Dynamic Lights Creeper Module, FMLFileResourcePack:Dynamic Lights EntityItem Module, FMLFileResourcePack:Dynamic Lights Entity Light Module, FMLFileResourcePack:Dynamic Lights Mob Equipment Light Module, FMLFileResourcePack:Dynamic Lights Fiery Arrows Light Module, FMLFileResourcePack:Dynamic Lights Flood Light, FMLFileResourcePack:Dynamic Lights OtherPlayers Light Module, FMLFileResourcePack:Dynamic Lights Player Light Module, FMLFileResourcePack:FastCraft, FMLFileResourcePack:IndustrialCraft 2, FMLFileResourcePack:Inventory Tweaks, FMLFileResourcePack:StatusEffectHUD, FMLFileResourcePack:AtomicStryker Update Check Mod, FMLFileResourcePack:Waila, FMLFileResourcePack:Waila Harvestability, FMLFileResourcePack:bspkrsCore, IT-Project 正式版 1.0 64x MC1.7.x.zip
[03:30:12] [Sound Library Loader/INFO]: Sound engine started



安装的mod是 应用能源2 10版
删除后正常运行
服务端安装后正常运行 
另服务端安装林业秒蹦 安装热力膨胀秒蹦 是不是要安装防冲突插件？
服务端版本：KCauldron-1.7.10-1517.168
只安装了工业2实验版2.2.2.802
BC管道：7.1.14
ic2扩展 太阳能

replies.author: ycl0605
replies.txt_content:
hhhhk 发表于 2015-12-4 17:58
你去试一试ID冲突解决
目标问题是客户端....醉了

replies.author: hhhhk
replies.txt_content: 是游戏打不开，还是不能进服？

replies.author: ycl0605
replies.txt_content:
hhhhk 发表于 2015-12-5 09:58
是游戏打不开，还是不能进服？
有时候能开游戏(经常性直接蹦) 有时候 点加入游戏后 游戏崩溃 (没有进去过)

replies.author: hhhhk
replies.txt_content: 你是想装了之后是自己玩还是玩服？mod多了或少了都玩不了服，如果你是装了后玩单人游戏的话，安装ID冲突解决。
